name: blotjson
description: Multi-language libraries to simplify visualisation of JSON.

scripts.generate-main-readme: rm README.md && cat docs/main_header.md >> README.md && cat docs/common_header.md >> README.md && cat docs/main_body.md >> README.md && cat docs/common_footer.md >> README.md

hooks.pre-commit: npm run generate-main-readme && git add README.md
